location.label: Location
location.toolTip: Region where the Data Collection Rule will be deployed. Use the same region as your Log Analytics workspace.

basics.name: workspaceResourceGroup
basics.label: Log Analytics workspace resource group
basics.toolTip: Resource group that contains the Log Analytics workspace where Windows event data will be sent.

constraints.validationMessage: Enter a valid resource group name.

basics.name: workspaceName
basics.label: Log Analytics workspace name
basics.toolTip: Name of the Log Analytics workspace that will receive the Windows Security events.

constraints.validationMessage: Workspace name must be 4-63 characters; alphanumeric and hyphens only.

options.text: Configure a Data Collection Rule (DCR) for Windows event logs. The DCR will collect Windows Security events (e.g. sign-in events) and send them to your Log Analytics workspace.

elements.name: deployWindowsDcr
elements.label: Deploy Windows Event Logs DCR?
elements.toolTip: When checked, a Data Collection Rule for Windows Security events will be created and linked to your Log Analytics workspace.

elements.name: windowsDcrName
elements.label: DCR name
elements.toolTip: Name for the Data Collection Rule. Must be unique in the resource group.

constraints.validationMessage: Use alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, or periods.
